cgcloud__Tour_Tour_Check__c.name: cgcloud__Tour_Tour_Check__c
cgcloud__Tour_Tour_Check__c.description: Stores the details of the relationship between tour and tour check.

cgcloud__Answer__c.description: Specified whether the answer has been given.

cgcloud__Check_Type__c.description: Specifies the check type of the tour check.

cgcloud__Tour_Check_Description__c.description: Specifies the description of the tour check.
